display_long_description:
Forget other home exercise fitness videos and other apps: **Fitness One XR brings you a personal coach experience**, typically only reserved for athletes and celebs, from the comfort of your own home.

Whether you're looking to improve your health, enhance your posture, strengthen your back, power your heart, or simply sculpt a six-pack: Fitness One XR is here for you.

🏋️‍♀️ **100+ FITNESS PROGRAMS**

Over a hundred fitness programs: from cardio to strengthening every single muscle group.

[media]

👨‍🏫 **PERSONALIZED COACHES**

With over a thousand options to customize your coach, build the ultimate personal trainer that will motivate you; and you alone.

[media]

🎵 **FITNESS MUSIC**

Listening to good, motivating music improves fitness performance; we got you covered!

🏝️ **MOTIVATING ENVIRONMENTS**

Bored of your own home or the local gym? Go fitness in a tropical paradise, billionaires gym, or a classic, beat, bronx gym; it's all your choice.

[media]

💸 **GET IT WHILE IT LASTS**

Fitness One XR is still one single purchase and that's it; a thousand times more affordable than the gym, a personal trainer, or anything else to get fit.
This the best value for your money to get fit, period.

Fitness One is the only VR app offering exercises for every muscle group; and together with our unparalleled, years of R&D-perfected form-tracking, fitness in VR just became more fun and effective. 

Over 40.000 users have already joined our fitness games, so jump in and feel fit!
